SQL.If: select * from ( select temp.idcard ,temp.dateofprenatal ,datediff(week,temp.dateofprenatal,temp.targetexamtime)+40 as ExamWeek ,lr.value from ( select pi.idcard,pi.dateofprenatal ,min(lo.examtime) targetexamtime ,max(lo.examtime) targetexamtime from LabOrder lo left join LabResult lr on lo.orderid = lr.orderid left join PregnantInfo pi on lo.idcard = pi.idcard where 1=1 and lr.itemid = @检验类别 and datediff(week,pi.dateofprenatal,lo.examtime)+40 >= @起始孕周 and datediff(week,pi.dateofprenatal,lo.examtime)+40 <= @截止孕周 group by pi.idcard,pi.dateofprenatal ) as temp left join LabOrder lo on temp.idcard = lo.idcard and temp.targetexamtime = lo.examtime left join LabResult lr on lo.orderid = lr.orderid and lr.itemid = @检验类别 ) as temp2 where value is not null group by idcard,dateofprenatal,ExamWeek,value

select * from ( select pi.idcard ,pi.dateofprenatal ,datediff(week,pi.dateofprenatal,lo.examtime)+40 as ExamWeek ,min(convert(decimal,lr.value)) as value ,max(convert(decimal,lr.value)) as value ,avg(convert(decimal,lr.value)) as value from LabOrder lo left join LabResult lr on lo.orderid = lr.orderid left join PregnantInfo pi on lo.idcard = pi.idcard where 1=1 and lr.itemid = @检验类别 and datediff(week,pi.dateofprenatal,lo.examtime)+40 >= @起始孕周 and datediff(week,pi.dateofprenatal,lo.examtime)+40 <= @截止孕周 group by pi.idcard,pi.dateofprenatal ) as temp2 where value is not null group by idcard,dateofprenatal,ExamWeek,value
